message: I propose dividing the money with a 3:1 ratio, where I receive $7500 and you receive $2500. This way, we both get a fair share, considering the inflation rate.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more due to the decreasing value of the money. This is a 60:40 split, which I believe is more fair given the circumstances.
Considering the inflation, I suggest an equal division of the $10000, ensuring both of us receive $5000. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the decreasing value of money over time.
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but I still think I deserve a larger share. This 55:45 split is a compromise, considering the current value of the money.
